Setting.Name: Number of partitions for k-fold test
Target class index for TP and FP rates

Comment.Text: The preprocessing of the signal is performed here... Note: be sure that the sampling rate and sample count per buffer you use in the acquisition server are compatible with the actual signal decimation factor

Overview This scenario should be used to train the LDA classifier. Just configure the Generic Stream Reader box to point to the last file you recorded with scenario 1-acquisition and fast forward this scenario. At the end of the training, you will have an estimation of the classifier performance printed in the console. If this performance is lower than 70%, just run a new 4-online session to have better results. Note: in order to run this scenario, the spatial filter should have been trained using 2-train-xDAWN !
You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1
